job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Job Title: Software Engineer 5

Location: Mountain View, CA (100% Remote is an option for this role as long as the candidate can work PST time zone)

Role: Full Time


Job Responsibilities

Requirements:

• 6+ years of professional experience as a Sr. Software Engineer

• 4+ years of solid experience in Ruby on Rails with experience in libraries like Resque and RSpec

• Experience with GrapQL is a big plus

• Experience in ReactJS/Redux JavaScript frameworks, Ad experience a plus

• Experience in JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and other core web technologies

• Experience in consuming REST APIs in JavaScript/NodeJS

• Experience in SCM Source Code Management systems and tools, such as GIT

• Strong knowledge in Computer Science foundations

• BS/MS in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent experience
